name: Contador de Pelados
synopsis: A web application that lets you record the number of people you encounter daily on the street.
description: A web project using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vue.js. This project was developed to keep track of how many people you see on the street in a day.

name: Pokedex
synopsis: An interactive web app that provides information about various Pokémon species.
description: A web application utilizing HTML, CSS, JS, Bootstrap, and the Pokedex API. It allows users to search for and get information about different Pokémon, and it also implements a Service Worker for offline functionality.

name: RapidTools
synopsis: A website designed to streamline simple tasks quickly with interactive tools.
description: A web project featuring HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vue.js. It includes a task manager and password generator, among other useful tools, to simplify daily tasks and provide an interactive and efficient user experience.
img_alt: Rapid tools, a site developed to facilitate simple tasks quickly

name: Cloud Shop
synopsis: An e-commerce platform built primarily with PHP and MySQL, featuring user registration and an admin dashboard.
description: This project involves building an online store using PHP and MySQL. Users can register, and administrators can log in. The site features a product catalog and a dashboard for administrators.

name: Aragoge
synopsis: A marketplace designed for high-performance athletes and professionals, serving as the final project for a web design and programming course.
description: A final project for the Web Design and Programming course at Escuela Da Vinci. Aragoge is a marketplace for high-performance athletes and professionals, developed using PHP, MySQL, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Laravel, and Vue.
img_alt: Final project of the career, Marketplace for professionals and athletes
